CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_captive_rebel
CEEvent.Text: {=DefaultCaptorEventsCommon5}Your prisoners outnumber your party and have managed to free themselves. Unfortunately for you, their first thought is of revenge, and you find yourself in the midst of violent rebellion. Gathering your troops, you hope your battlefield experience will prove more effective than raw numbers or your positions will be reversed before the day is out.

CEEvent.Name: TB_scion_prisoner_discovery
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13100}One of your men brings one of the war captives to your attention, a filthy, bedraggled young man. The soldier reveals that the 'man' is in fact a woman, a scion of a rival house who fled the comforts and safety of home for the promise of adventure. She's found it, though perhaps not quite as she intended, and the soldier asks you what you wish to do with her.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_13102}Offer to let her join your banner.

CEEvent.Name: TB_captive_walking
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13104}As you continue your journey, you notice {CAPTIVE_NAME} struggling to keep up, {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her bare soles bloodied by the rough road. She glances up at you when she notices you watching, then averts her gaze and continues, doing her best to avoid further damaging her feet.{?}his bare soles bloodied by the rough road. He glances up at you when he notices you watching, then averts his gaze and continues, doing his best to avoid further damaging his feet.{\?}

CEEvent.Name: TB_captive_sleep
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13107}During a brief stop to refresh yourselves, you notice {CAPTIVE_NAME} resting, clearly exhausted from the march. {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}She shudders slightly in her sleep, snoring gently, and her chains clink softly, like gentle chimes, as she rolls to one side.{?}He shudders slightly in his sleep, snoring gently, and his chains clink softly, like gentle chimes, as he rolls to one side.{\?}

CEEvent.Name: TB_captive_work
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13110}Your troops have discovered {CAPTIVE_NAME} has a talent for the tailoring art, and have begun bringing her clothes to mend with some frequency. She seems grateful for the chance to rest her feet, and though she occasionally pricks a finger with the dull needle she's been provided, it seems a more than equitable trade.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_13111}Encourage this. It is practical, and keeps {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her{?}him{\?} busy.

CEEvent.Name: TB_captive_stories
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13113}A group of captives and not a few of your troops are listening to {CAPTIVE_NAME} intently as {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}she tells a story of a far-off land, full of strange and unbelievable claims. She weaves her story expertly, keeping their attention rapt as she{?}he tells a story of a far-off land, full of strange and unbelievable claims. He weaves his story expertly, keeping their attention rapt as he{\?} describes daring escapes and wonderful adventures. It's good to see them enjoying themselves, but you worry they will make mistakes while they're distracted.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_13116}Order your men to get back to work.

CEEvent.Name: TB_captive_sparring
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13117}Some of your men have decided to play a game, several of them prodding {CAPTIVE_NAME} to and fro on the march, using the butts of their spears. {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}She tries to rush whoever has struck her, but as she's chained and naked and they're fully armed it's not very intimidating; but she gets a surprising number of solid blows in, to the surprise and humiliation of her opponents. She can't dodge forever, though and after a brief stumble the troops close in and begin beating her for showing them up. She falls to the ground, yelping and sobbing as they begin to gloat in her defeat.{?}He tries to rush whoever has struck him, but as he's chained and naked and they're fully armed it's not very intimidating; but he gets a surprising number of solid blows in, to the surprise and humiliation of his opponents. He can't dodge forever, though and after a brief stumble the troops close in and begin beating him for showing them up. He falls to the ground, trying not to yelp as they begin to gloat in his defeat.{\?}

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_13116}Order your men to get back to work.

CEEvent.Name: TB_captive_sparring_m
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13117}Some of your men have decided to play a game, several of them prodding {CAPTIVE_NAME} to and fro on the march, using the butts of their spears. {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}She tries to rush whoever has struck her, but as she's chained and naked and they're fully armed it's not very intimidating; but she gets a surprising number of solid blows in, to the surprise and humiliation of her opponents. She can't dodge forever, though and after a brief stumble the troops close in and begin beating her for showing them up. She falls to the ground, yelping and sobbing as they begin to gloat in her defeat.{?}He tries to rush whoever has struck him, but as he's chained and naked and they're fully armed it's not very intimidating; but he gets a surprising number of solid blows in, to the surprise and humiliation of his opponents. He can't dodge forever, though and after a brief stumble the troops close in and begin beating him for showing them up. He falls to the ground, trying not to yelp as they begin to gloat in his defeat.{\?}

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_13116}Order your men to get back to work.

CEEvent.Name: TB_captive_washing_soldier
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13122}During a brief halt to your march, you notice {CAPTIVE_NAME} being washed by one of your soldiers, relief in {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her eyes despite the occasional wince as the man's hands gently clean the bruised parts of her skin. He gently gropes her as her bath continues, but appears to have no further sexual intentions towards your captive.{?}his eyes despite the occasional wince as the woman's hands gently clean the bruised parts of his skin. She gently gropes him as his bath continues, but appears to have no further sexual intentions towards your captive.{\?}

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_13124}Order your soldier to stop comforting the enemy at once.

CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13122}During a brief halt to your march, you notice {CAPTIVE_NAME} being washed by one of your soldiers, relief in {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her eyes despite the occasional wince as the man's hands gently clean the bruised parts of her skin. CEEvent.Name: TB_horny_soldiers
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13125}One of your soldiers warns you that one of your men was found raping your captive {CAPTIVE_NAME}, and while on duty, no less. He notes that many of the men have grown horny watching you have your way with the female prisoners, so this is likely to happen again unless steps are taken to prevent it.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_13126}Publicly execute the rapists. Discipline must be maintained.

CEEvent.Name: TB_horny_soldiers_warn
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13129}You gather your soldiers around and publicly berate the man for his actions, telling him that you will not tolerate such dishonorable conduct amongst your soldiers. He seems cowed for now, if angry that you've singled him out for humiliation, though you notice some smirks and laughter amongst the crowd...

CEEvent.Name: TB_horny_soldiers_indulge
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13123}You give the word that some sacrifices may be necessary in war, and that you understand that a weary soldier may long for the comforts of home. You grant them permission to sate their lusts so long as it neither interferes with their work nor permanently harms your captives. Your troops seem happier at the news, though the sound of agonized screams and sobs sometimes makes it difficult to sleep, and strange bruises and swelling bellies become more common among your prisoners.

CEEvent.Name: TB_horny_soldiers_execute
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13125}You gather your soldiers around and publicly execute those responsible, telling your soldiers that rapists will not be tolerated among your band. They seem cowed, even nervous as the men's blood saturates the ground.

CEEvent.Name: CE_captor_female_three_female
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13127}{CAPTIVE_NAME} has attempted to escape, nearly making her way out of camp before she is caught, her arms and legs bound in iron shackles. She is dragged before you, insolence clearly visible in her narrowed eyes, and your guards ask what punishment you deem appropriate for rebellious captives. You can't help but notice the bulges in their breeches and the greasy hand-marks on her breasts and buttocks... It's clear your men have at least one punishment ready should you allow it.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_13129}Let your men have their say with her discipline.

CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13127}{CAPTIVE_NAME} has attempted to escape, nearly making her way out of camp before she is caught, her arms and legs bound in iron shackles. She is dragged before you, insolence clearly visible in her narrowed eyes, and your guards ask what punishment you deem appropriate for rebellious captives. You can't help but notice the bulges in their breeches and the greasy hand-marks on her breasts and buttocks... It's clear your men have at least one punishment ready should you allow it. CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13140}You notice {CAPTIVE_NAME} walking along, {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her fine figure on display for all your troops to appreciate, and she glances towards you fearfully. She kneels, begging you for your mercy and asks if she's done something wrong.{?}his fine figure on display for all your troops to appreciate, and he glances towards you fearfully. CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_captive_slavery_undevoted
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13143}{CAPTIVE_NAME} trembles at your touch, her once friendly gaze turned to fear and loathing. She kneels before you, asking you what sort of person would utterly subjugate their lover after giving them a glimpse of tender kindness? Once she would have done anything for you out of affection and respect. Now she obeys your every whim for fear of your anger. What happened to the person she fell in love with?{?}his once friendly gaze turned to fear and loathing. He kneels before you, asking you what sort of person would utterly subjugate their lover after giving them a glimpse of tender kindness? CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13152}Before you can react, {CAPTIVE_NAME} walks up and kisses you fully on the lips, looking sorrowfully at {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her ex-lover. She explains that though she enjoyed their youthful romance, she has found her true love in you, and neither needs nor wishes for rescuing. She bids the dejected youth on his way and smiles at you, promising to join you in bed later as she gently gropes your groin.{?}his ex-lover. CEEvent.Name: TB_captor_tds_kidnap
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_12066}A sudden explosion jolts you into action, and you move over to the side of your camp to investigate. You realize too late that the sound was a distraction, and you see a handsome dark-haired man carrying {CAPTIVE_NAME} away, neatly bundled over his shoulder. Your guards try to stop him, but he neatly vaults over them, captive in tow, and disappears into the forest. You're almost impressed at his audacity...

CEEvent.Name: BC_captive_new_arrival
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_14081}Your guards have marched out your female prisoners to clean up the filthy cells, and you spy {CAPTIVE_NAME} for the first time since defeating her forces. Stripped and chained to your liking, you find yourself studying her curves intensely. Perhaps today you should introduce yourself to her...

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_14082}Have her brought over right now to get a better look at her.
{=BCCaptor_Text_14083}Have her sent to your audience chamber for a formal introduction as a guest of your warband.
{=BCCaptor_Text_14084}Remember to have {CAPTIVE_NAME} summoned when you aren't so busy.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_captive_look_new
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_14085}{CAPTIVE_NAME} stands defiant before you, too innocent of the ways of the world to recognize the peril which your whim may bring.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_14086}Have the ladies of the harem clean her up for the next time you need something young and sweet.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_captive_look_wife
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_14087}{CAPTIVE_NAME} kneels warily before you, well aware of the peril which your whim may bring.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_14088}Have her cleaned, and have the ladies of the harem prepare a room for her.

CEEvent.Name: TB_captive_bargain
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13167}You spy {CAPTIVE_NAME} carefully eating a piece of bread, holding it as though it were more precious than gold. You certainly don't remember allowing bread to the prisoners, but it's possible they made a deal with one of your troops. {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}Judging by the tears in her eyes, though, she likely didn't get the better end of the deal.{?}{\?}

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_13168}Ask h{?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}er where s{?}im where {\?}he got the bread.

CEEvent.Name: BC_captive_bargain_theft
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_13172}You announce that you've found evidence {CAPTIVE_NAME} has stolen bread, and as punishment for {?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}her thievery her plunder will be confiscated and she will receive fifty lashes. She collapses, sobbing openly, and you have her tied to a post. The sound of whipping and agonized screams fills the air, and by the time her punishment is over she is barely breathing, the vicious wounds on her body oozing viscous blood.{?}his thievery his plunder will be confiscated and he will receive fifty lashes. He collapses, begging for mercy, and you have him tied to a post. The sound of whipping and agonized screams fills the air, and by the time his punishment is over he is barely breathing, the vicious wounds on his body oozing viscous blood.{\?}

CEEvent.Name: BC_captive_bargain_query

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11122}Tell her you notice how well-behaved she has become.

CEEvent.Name: BC_captive_trustee_disobedient
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11123}Your serving staff has complained that {CAPTIVE_NAME} has become sloppy in her duties. You think that she has some potential in your service, though, so you tell her she can wait on you and your guests at a banquet tonight to show that she can do better.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11124}"That's a lovely vintage, {CAPTIVE_NAME}. Don't spill, or I shall be very cross!"

CEEvent.Name: BC_captive_trustee_obedient
CEEvent.Text: {=BCCaptor_Text_11125}Your serving staff has praised how well {CAPTIVE_NAME} has performed her duties of late. You think that she has great potential in your service, so you tell her she can wait on you and your guest at a private event, in your quarters, tonight. Her face reveals shock, briefly, as you explain where you would like the wine poured.

Option.OptionText: {=BCCaptor_Text_11124}"That's a lovely vintage, {CAPTIVE_NAME}. Don't spill, or I shall be very cross!"
